entries.@tmp_horde_enc_deathlab_find_terminals: Find laptops and upload the data
entries.@tmp_horde_enc_deathlab_push_carts: Connect carts to the core to disable the shield
entries.@horde_crystalline_storm_event_2: Crystalline storm intensifies! Take cover to survive!
entries.@horde_activity_emp_sprint: Activate all EMP's to unlock the Strafer depot
entries.@horde_activity_emp_sprint_open: Lock is hacked! Open the container
entries.@horde_parasites_get_orbs: Kill glass hounds to retrieve their spines
entries.@horde_parasites_destroy_boss: Use hound spines to damage the Grinder
entries.@horde_noregen: Health regeneration impaired. Collect healing energy from downed enemies.
entries.@horde_pushback: Repel the anomalies inbound
entries.@horde_extraction_hint: Need confirmation from another squad member
entries.@horde_extraction_initiated: Extraction request pending. Confirmation from another Operative required.
entries.@horde_extraction_confirmed: Extraction request confirmed. Proceed to extraction point.
entries.@lost_supply_found: The lost supply drop is somewhere around here
entries.@increased_melee_description: Enemies deal greater damage in melee
entries.@earthquake_description: Occasional tremors occur throughout the map
entries.@the_hunt_description: Dreaded Chasers are on the hunt
entries.@fireflies_description: Crystalline fireflies crawl out of downed enemies
entries.@star_bombs_description: Glassheads may leave explosive residue upon death
entries.@precision_strike_description: Series of airborne strikes target Shellguard Operatives
entries.@lightning_anomaly_description: Nasty lightning orb follows the team
entries.@airstrike_description: Crystalline shards fall down from the sky
entries.@horde_noregen_description: Health regeneration rate is decreased for all Operatives
entries.@pushback_description: Invisible anomaly attempts to knock the team off their feet
entries.@eruption_description: Pulsating lava geysers break through the soil
entries.@glasshead_birds_description: The Zone commands mutated Crystalline birds to attack you
entries.@shielded_strafers_description: Strafers equip energy shields, which grant them extra armor
entries.@death_rattle_curse_description: Revival is impossible for a certain duration after death
entries.@tornado_mod_description: A destructive whirlwind follows the team
entries.@horde_defeat: YOUR SQUAD DIED. REWARDS ARE HALVED.
entries.@horde_tip_1: Contamination grows when you die or complete primary objectives.
entries.@horde_tip_2: Each contamination level adds a new negative modifier — up to a total of five.
entries.@horde_tip_3: You may choose to evacuate with rewards after each completed objective.
entries.@horde_tip_4: The difficulty increases with every completed objective, but so does the quality of gear.
entries.@horde_tip_5: Most objectives require coordinated team action. Sheer firepower may not suffice.
entries.@horde_tip_6: In this game, you loot crates, not deliver them.
entries.@horde_tip_7: Upon successful extraction, some of your gains will be stashed for use on your next Expedition.
entries.@horde_tip_8: Don't hesitate to signal for extraction if you feel the Zone is too tough for you.
entries.@horde_tip_9: The rewards increase with each primary objective, but you lose half of everything if your squad dies.
entries.@horde_tip_10: When the contamination reaches the maximum, you must evacuate immediately.
entries.@horde_tip_11: It's the Zone that controls the difficulty — you merely choose when to extract.
entries.@horde_encounter_complete: YOU HAVE COMPLETED A PRIMARY OBJECTIVE
entries.@horde_noregen_mod_descr: Collect healing residue from downed enemies.
entries.@electrifier_description: Operatives and enemies occasionally get charged with static electricity and damage everyone around
entries.@healing_anomaly_mod_description: An anomaly that heals enemies in a small radius

entries.@activity_broken_heart_completed: Look around for a highlighted secret

entries.@expedition_objective_complete_secondary: Mission objective complete. Guaranteed reward: 1000 Credits, 4 Blueprints
entries.@goal_explore_sectors_description: Visit different Sectors of the Zone.
entries.@goal_defeat_sector_bosses_description: Sector Bosses are major hostile activities in the area. Seek and destroy them.
entries.@goal_request_supply_drops_description: You can request Supply Drops via Mule Communicators. Supplies cost Red Salt.
entries.@goal_enter_dungeon_description: Find a Dungeon entrance and break in.
entries.@goal_decontamination_devices_descriptio: Locate a Decontaminator, launch it and guard it until decontamination is complete.
entries.@contract_kill_glassheads_description: Destroy a certain amount of Glassheads.
entries.@contract_kill_strafers_description: Eliminate a certain amount of Strafers.
entries.@contract_lost_supply_drops_description: Lost Supply bins are scattered throughout the Sector.
entries.@contract_secret_stashes_description: Chosen stashes are hidden throughout the Zone. Look sharp for audio or visual clues.
entries.@contract_supply_drops_description: Request and secure Supply Drops in current Sector.
entries.@contract_world_activities_description: Look for various activities as you explore the Zone, and complete them.
entries.@contract_clear_dungeon_description: Find and clear the Dungeon in current Sector.
entries.@contract_dungeon_extraction_quest_descr:
Epic Contract. Clear
Strafer Vault
dungeon, obtain Contaminated Canister and extract it from the Zone.
entries.@tutor_obj_mark_device: Mark Mule for your teammates via Scanner
entries.@goal_extract_red_salt_description: Successfully extract with a certain amount of Red Salt
entries.@goal_destroy_dementors_description: Eliminate levitating Glassheads throughout the Zone
entries.@goal_extract_after_sector_bosses_name: Extract after defeating two Sector Bosses
entries.@goal_extract_after_sector_bosses_descri: Defeat two Sector Bosses and successfully extract from the Zone
entries.@contract_find_maneki_neko_description: Find and activate a Maneki Neko figurine
entries.@contract_complete_emp_sprints_descripti: Hack and loot Strafer depots by activating EMP's
entries.@contract_kill_minotaurs_description: Eliminate a certain number of Minotaurs
entries.@contract_kill_nest_supporters_descripti: Eliminate a certain number of Gardeners
entries.@server_termination_1: Provider to terminate server in 40 seconds. Your loot will be extracted.
entries.@server_termination_3:
Server termination in
%1
seconds. Your loot will be extracted.
entries.@dungeon_intel_descr: Request intel on Dungeon location. Check your scanner for update.
entries.@shard_cache_descr: Small amount of Shards, a Crystalline resource required to unlock Operative gear.
entries.@shard_chunk_descr: Moderate amount of Shards, a Crystalline resource required to unlock Operative gear.
entries.@spore_cache_descr: Small amount of Spores, a Crystalline resource required to unlock Operative gear.
entries.@spore_chunk_descr: Moderate amount of Spores, a Crystalline resource required to unlock Operative gear.
entries.@capacitor_cache_descr: Small amount of Capacitors, a Crystalline resource required to unlock Operative gear.
entries.@capacitor_chunk_descr: Moderate amount of Capacitors, a Crystalline resource required to unlock Operative gear.
entries.@energy_core_descr: Energy Core is an rare Crystalline artifact, required to unlock high grade Operative gear.
entries.@red_matter_descr: Red Matter is a phenomenon of extreme rarity, which occasionaly leaks from the Red Realm. It is a precious material, required to unlock top tier Operative gear.
entries.@contamination_lightning_strike: Beware of lightning strikes
entries.@contamination_lightning_strike_descript: Take shelter from lightning bolts when they strike
entries.@goal_collect_red_salt_description: Collect a certain amount of Red Salt as a team
entries.@contract_kill_elite_glassheads_descript: Eliminate a certain number of Elite Glassheads
entries.@contract_kill_elite_strafers_descriptio: Eliminate a certain number of Elite Strafers
entries.@contract_kill_elite_enemies_description: Kill Elite enemies of any faction
entries.@contract_kill_enemies_w_presicion_descr: Perform a certain amount of Precision kills
entries.@contract_triple_kills_description: Perform a certain amount of Triple kills
entries.@goal_collect_epic_perks_description: Obtain Epic or Legendary perks from Supply bins
entries.@goal_complete_contracts_description: Complete a certain number of Contracts
entries.@contract_pickup_glassheads_semple_descr: Collect Crystalline samples from downed Adamants
entries.@contract_kill_goliath_description: Locate and kill a Strafer Goliath
entries.@contract_earn_battle_medals_description: Earn instant reward Medals for various activities
entries.@contract_kill_enemies_w_presicion_secon: Score Precision kills while securing Supply Drops
entries.@burn_on_ziplines_description: Careful! Zip-lines are covered with deadly Crystalline dust!
entries.@sworn_friends_description: Strafers equip selenium-infused armor, which makes Crystalline creatures no longer hostile to them
entries.@mod_drones_patrol_description: Communicator Mules may be overtaken by Strafer drones
entries.@mod_earthquake_sludge_label_description: Earth tremors hamper the team's advance throughout the Zone
entries.@mod_death_increases_contamination_descr: Contamination level increases each time a squad member is downed
